commentBody: Don't dismiss a coup. If there's a will there may be a way. The motivation? The utter realization that the party almost certainly has nothing to lose and something to gain--not the WH but their party. So many Republicans now know. Trump is a one-trick pony. He will not "pivot." He can't because he has nothing to offer a general electorate. He knows that. He will keep doing what he does and hope for the best. Watch for a coup attempt.
